target_patch.description: The sound direction for this 90-second clip is a unique fusion of dramatic hip hop and classical music, creating an intense and dynamic auditory experience. The music is designed to complement the futuristic theme of the sport, with powerful beats and orchestral elements that enhance the drama and excitement of the gameplay. The hip hop influences bring a modern, edgy vibe, while the classical components add a layer of sophistication and depth. This combination ensures that the sound is both distinctive and memorable, perfectly capturing the essence of a high-energy, futuristic ball sport.
